metadata.title: CVE-2019-11236 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the urllib3 library through 1.24.1 for Python, CRLF injection ispossible if the attacker controls the request parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11236` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-urllib3 - 1.7.1-1ubuntu4.1+esm1
python-urllib3-whl - 1.7.1-1ubuntu4.1+esm1
python3-urllib3 - 1.7.1-1ubuntu4.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: python-urllib3 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.1-1ubuntu4.1+esm1').
